articles.title: Zomato subsidiary withdraws NBFC application, says no impact on operations - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Shares of Zomato Ltd ended at ₹209.05, up by ₹5, or 2.45% on the BSE. Zomato continues to generate substantial other income considering it has cash worth over ₹12,000 crore on its books.
